extension.title: Browser Extension
extension.description: Shorten URLs directly from your browser with one click.
extension.installWarning: Since Zhort is not yet listed in the {browser} Store, you need to use developer mode.
extension.step2chrome: Open chrome://extensions/ in the address bar.
extension.step3chrome: Enable "Developer mode" in the top right.
extension.step4chrome: Click "Load unpacked" and select the folder.
extension.step2edge: Open edge://extensions/ in the address bar.
extension.step3edge: Enable "Developer mode" in the left menu.
extension.step4edge: Click "Load unpacked" and select the folder.
extension.step4firefox: Select the manifest.json file in the unpacked folder.
